name: Building Blocks | GUI Framework
description:
Kick start your design projects with the most common UI elements.


Here you will find elements based on Html common tags (but it's possible to use those for mobile apps design) with the minimum of styles applied so you can apply your own design with ease.


I hope you find it helpful!
